title: Secretary-General Video Message for ITU Telecom World 2015 (UN - United Nations)
text: ( Source : UN - United Nations) Secretary-General Video Message for ITU Telecom World 2015 New York , 12 October 2015 It is a pleasure to greet all the participants in ITU Telecom World. This annual event highlights the catalytic role of
